sentences.en: Israel would continue its efforts to destroy the terrorist infrastructure, arrest those behind terrorist activities and harshly punish those who perpetrate these murderous activities.
sentences.cn: 以色列将继续努力摧毁恐怖主义基础设施，逮捕恐怖主义活动的幕后黑手并严厉惩罚实施这些杀人活动的人。

sentences.en: Did you perpetrate this terrible poem?
People who perpetrate, condone or facilitate it must be brought to justice.
sentences.cn: 必须将参与、宽恕或协助这种行为的人绳之以法。
